title: Economic Systems and Resource Allocation
description: Understanding how different economic systems allocate resources and impact personal financial opportunities, with application to career choices, investment decisions, and understanding economic policy effects on personal finance.
learning_objectives: Define and compare capitalism, socialism, and mixed economies
Explain the difference between command and market economic systems
Understand how property rights function in different economic systems
Analyze how resource allocation mechanisms work in various economies
Evaluate how economic systems affect personal financial opportunities

skill_builder.title: Economic Systems Comparison Tool
skill_builder.description: An interactive tool where students compare capitalism, socialism, and mixed economies, analyze resource allocation mechanisms, and evaluate how different economic systems impact personal financial opportunities and economic freedom.
